name: AutoBattler!
description:
AutoBattler! is a strategy game with automatic mechanics.

Choose between 6 different units:

  • Melee (tank, low damage)
  • Archers (squishy, high damage)
  • Priest (healer, no damage)
  • Hero (area heal, high damage, tanky)
  • Ballista (strong against structures, aoe damage)
  • Necromancer (spawn undead, low life and low damage)

Fight against your enemy in 6 different levels, or fight in a random battle in Arena.

Gameplay:
